response:
To summarize the information provided, here are the answers to your questions:

8. The account number will be generated by the bank after they receive and process the required documents.
9. Any Non-Resident Bangladeshi who is 18 years old or older, holds a valid passport, and has a valid Work Permit/Residence Permit can open this bank account. Dual citizens holding foreign passports are also eligible.
10. The following documents are required to open the account:
   - Account Opening Form (DD-MM-YYYY)
   - Gender
   - Resident or Non-Resident status
   - Mobile number and email address (in block letters)
   - Gender of the account holder
   - Account Holder’s Name (in block letters)
   - Account Holder’s Name in Bengali
   - Father’s Name
   - Mother’s Name
   - Present, permanent, and contact/mailing addresses
   - Spouse's Name
   - Date of Birth
   - Nationality (with a passport copy for foreign nationals)

For Bank Alfalah Internet Banking:

5. To register, visit bankalfalah.com, go to the Internet Banking section, click on the registration button, read and agree to the terms and conditions, and complete the registration process.
   - You should be a Bank Alfalah account holder
   - Your local cell number must be registered with Bank Alfalah
   - Your email address must be updated at Bank Alfalah

Source: data/processed/banking/FAQ_MDBDigitalProbashiSavingsAccount_2024.pdf (Page: 1)
Source: data/processed/banking/1688964931_2. Account Opening form (Individual)-Editable.pdf (Page: 0)
Source: data/processed/banking/FAQs-Bank Al Arafah.pdf (Page: 0)
Source: data/processed/banking/FAQ-OBU-IB-AccountOpening - primeBank.pdf (Page: 1)

This information is for educational purposes only and not financial advice. Consult a professional for personalized guidance.

process.  
 
8. How do I get an account number?  
 
The account number will be generated after the Bank receives the required documents.  
 
9. Who can open this Bank account?  
 
 Any Non Resident Bangladeshi who is 18 years old and above can open this account having Valid 
Passport and valid Work Permit/Residence Permit.  
 Dual citizen holding foreign passport 
 
10. What are the documents required to open this account?

Account Opening is given below:
D D M M Y Y Y Y
Male Female
Resident Non-Resident
Third Gender
Mobile Number E-mail
(BLOCK LETTER)
Gender
Account Holder’s Name
(BLOCK LETTER)
Account Holder’s Name (Bengali)
Father’s Name
Mother’s Name
Present Address
Permanent Address
Contact/Mailing Address
Spouse's Name
Date of Birth
Nationality
(Passport copy with Visa must be
obtained for foreign nationals)
(For Non-Resident Status, Guidelines for Foreign Exchange

Bank Alfalah Internet Banking has the following prerequisites: 
 
▪ You should be a Bank Alfalah account holder 
▪ Your local cell number must be registered with Bank Alfalah 
▪ Your email address must be updated at Bank Alfalah 
 
5. How do I register for Bank Alfalah Internet Banking? 
 
i. Visit bankalfalah.com 
ii. Go to Internet Banking section and click on the registration button 
iii. Read the terms and conditions and check the box if you agree to the terms

B. Nominee(s) 
a. Identity Proof Document: NID/Passport/Birth Certificate of the Nominee(s). 
b. 01 photo of Nominee(s) attested by account holder. 
 
 
C. Remitter of the Account: 
a. Completed Personal Information Form of remitter (signed by the Applicant) 
b. Identity Proof Document: Copy of passport along with valid work permits visa or valid resident 
permit. 
c. Proof Documents of Bona fide Relation with Account Holder: An indemnity (banks prescribed
